ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ABUSE.description: Leave it blank if you dont want Profanity in D3vilBot. Else Fill ON.

PM_LOG_ID.description: Fill your private Channel ID if you want to Log PM messages. Get channel id from @ShowJsonBot

PM_PERMIT.description: Fill DISABLE to turn off pm permit.

D3VILBOT_SESSION.description: Get this value by using repl or termux. Refer to Repo for more info.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.

LOGGER_ID.description: Make a private group and add rose. Do /id and paste the chat I'd here.

TAG_LOGGER.description: Make a group and add rose. Do /id and paste the chat id here.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the username here.

YOUR_CHANNEL.description: Fill your channel username(without @) to get this displayed on your D3VIL Alive.

YOUR_GROUP.description: Fill your group username(without @) to get this displayed on your D3VIL Alive.

SUDO_USERS.description: Userid of user to grant sudo access. Add multiple sudo users by giving a space between userids

ASSISTANT.description: Default ON. Your Assistant is on if you want to off Then Remove Value.
